channel.title: Adding pictures to interface?(Please read.)
channel.description:
I have the blank interfaces, and the one I'm going to use as an exmample shows up and says "What would you like to make?" at the top, with two blank options(make 1,8874 and make 1,8878). You can right click them, and make 1, 5, 10, x shows up. I wanna know how to put the picture of an item there. Is that another interface, or can I use this one? Shortbow and a longbow for now I guess. Shortbow is 50, and longbow is 48.
Thanks.
